rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with ample storage and a small seating area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A multi-functional open space with large windows for natural light, integrated kitchenette area on one side to maximize space while keeping budget in check.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a large window for ventilation and natural lighting, ensuring Vastu compatibility.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room with an attached balcony focusing on north-east direction to attract positive energy. The design includes large windows for ventilation and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Well-lit, ventilated room with a balcony facing the east to optimize morning sunlight in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen space designed for efficient workflow, incorporating energy-efficient appliances while being mindful of budget constraints.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional bathroom with proper ventilation and natural light through skylights as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: Dedicated space for storage near the entrance to maximize accessibility and efficient use of available space.

openings.description: Large window for natural light and ventilation, following Vastu principles.
Balcony window ensuring fresh air and natural lighting.
Balcony window to capture morning sunlight and adhere to Vastu guidelines.
Window for ventilation and natural light with careful attention to Vastu direction.
Main entrance door ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: Enhanced bedroom space with extended balcony for extra light and ventilation, following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with a dedicated balcony ensuring good natural light and airflow in accordance to Vastu.

openings.description: Spacious balcony designed to maximize exposure to natural light and facilitate fresh air circulation.
Functional balcony integrated into the design for additional natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Open space designed for relaxation, outdoor dining, and social gatherings. Incorporates greenery to enhance the natural environment.

openings.description: Rooftop access via a compact staircase ensuring safety and Vastu alignment.
